auth.name: Name
auth.login_description: Enter your name and PIN to access your account.
auth.register_description: Create a new account by entering your name and choosing a 4-digit PIN.
auth.welcome_message: Welcome to Platespottr! Please login or create an account to continue.
auth.name_too_short: Name must be at least 2 characters long.
auth.invalid_credentials: Invalid name or PIN. Please try again.
auth.account_creation_failed: Failed to create account. Please try again.
auth.login_failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

settings.reset_account_content: This will reset all your data and log you out. Are you sure?

app.press_for_seconds: Hold the button for {seconds} second to register the number
app.add_plate_description: Click "{add}" to add {number}. Don't forget to check the prize list after to see if you're on your way to the top!
app.add_plate_description_no_friends: Click "{add}" to add a number. Add your friends to see who will be the first to reach the top!

completed.title: You did it!
completed.description: You've found all license plates! Great job!

confirm.remove_content: Are you sure you want to remove {name}?
confirm.reset_last_plate_content: Are you sure you want to reset to number {number}?
confirm.reset_all_data_content: Are you sure you want to reset all numbers?
confirm.logout_content: Are you sure you want to log out?
confirm.delete_account_content: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.change_country_content: Are you sure you want to change country? This action will reset all your numbers and cannot be undone.

toplist.percentage_description: Percentage of days that the number has been found
toplist.toplist_tagline: Can you reach the top before reaching the final number?

game_rules.title: Game rules
game_rules.order_description: You must find all numbers in order from 001 to 999. You can't skip or 'save' numbers for later.
game_rules.real_plates_description: The number must be seen on a real Swedish license plate in real life—not on TV, phone, poster, or other images.
game_rules.number_format_description: Only numbers without a letter at the end count. Example: ABC123 is valid, but ABC12A is not. Personalized plates do not count.
game_rules.traffic_safety_description: Always be careful when searching for numbers in traffic. Your safety comes before the game.

important_safety_rules.title: Important safety rules
important_safety_rules.rule_1: Never drive while looking for numbers
important_safety_rules.rule_2: As a passenger – help the driver focus on the road
important_safety_rules.rule_3: Use safe places like parking lots and bus stops
important_safety_rules.rule_4: Be aware of your surroundings when moving in traffic
important_safety_rules.rule_5: Respect other people's property and privacy
important_safety_rules.remember_safety: Remember: Safety always comes before the game. Be responsible!
important_safety_rules.understood: Yes, I have read and understood the rules, and that all data is handled according to GDPR.

notifications.login_failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
notifications.account_creation_failed: Failed to create account. Please try again.
notifications.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
notifications.api_error: Server error. Please try again later.
